Sterling_Ranch.info: Sterling Ranch is routinely flown with drone imagery to capture construction progress.  You can see below the escalation of construrcion between Oct 2018 (left) and June 2019 (right)

lyonsRidge.info: One of the more picturesque projects done recently.  Lyons ridge offers the opportunity to work within the foothills just west of Denver, CO.

chatfield.info: The Chatfield Reservoir Expansion included a large restructure of the existing swim beach and parking facilites.  View the before and after imagery below.
